Title: Hakos Baelz
GameText: Power - Chaotic Leader: 1 Hero plays the top card of their deck. If that Hero is an ally, draw 1 card.

- Discard the top card of a deck.
- Play the top card of a deck.
- Discover a One-Shot from a deck.

Title: Absolute Chaos
GameText:
Reveal the top card of your deck. Draw it or replace it.
Play the top card of your deck.
Quote: Yolo is my ninja way! It's time to put those moves out on display!

Title: Blessing of Chaos
GameText:
3 Heroes may reveal and replace the top card of their respective decks.
1 Hero target may deal 1 target 3 infernal damage.
Quote: "I would like to ask for new pants, more rng luck, and world chaos! Strictly for Council work purposes."

Title: Bruh!
GameText:
1 ally Hero may reveal and replace the top card of their deck.
If the revealed card was a One-Shot card, they may play the top card of their deck.
If it was not, they may draw the top card of their deck, and Hakos Baelz deals 1 target 2 infernal damage.
Quote: "It's an expression that can               be used in so many different scenarios...   bruh is a way of life."

Title: Chaotic Battlefield
GameText: Whenever Hakos Baelz would deal infernal damage, she may instead deal up to X targets 1 fixed projectile damage each, where X is the original amount of damage.
Quote: "I have aim problems! Aim doko?! that's embarassing, don't clip that."

Title: Dynamic Relationship
GameText:
Hakos Baelz may deal 1 ally character 2 fixed psychic damage. That character may deal Hakos Baelz 2 fixed psychic damage.
Each Hero dealt damage this way may discover 1 Ongoing or Item card.
Quote: "Dear IRyS, You have brought so much happiness to me. Thank you for being in a divorce with me. I love you."

Title: Mr. Squeaks
GameText:
When you would play the top card of your deck, you may play 1 card instead.
START PHASE
You may play the top card of your deck.
Quote: "I don't really pay attention to her. I'm just here to make sure she doesn't die."

Title: Play Dice!
GameText:
After a revealed card is replaced in a deck, you may shuffle that deck.
Whenever a deck is shuffled, Hakos Baelz deals 1 target 1 infernal damage.
POWER: Reveal the top card of 1 deck.
Quote: For this moment I am truly really me!

Title: Rat Student
GameText:
Discover 1 Limited card. If no card was played this way, play the top card of your deck.
You may discard 1 card. If you do, draw 2 cards.
Quote: "Rat school? Yeah, of course I have to go to rat school. I'm forever twelve." - Hakos Baelz

Title: Revel in Chaos
GameText:
Destroy up to 2 Ongoing cards.
For each Hero Ongoing card destroyed this way, play the top card of your deck.
Quote: "How many cups of coffee do you need before you completely lose touch with reality and become unhinged?"

Title: The Council - Chaos
GameText:
Whenever an ally Hero would play the top card of their deck, they may first reveal and replace the top card of their deck.
After you play a One-Shot card, Hakos Baelz may deal 1 target 2 infernal damage.
POWER: Discover 1 One-Shot card.

Title: Toxictaro
GameText:
+1 damage dealt by Hakos Baelz
After one of your cards is destroyed, Hakos Baelz deals 1 target 1 infernal damage.
POWER: Destroy 1 Ongoing card. Draw 1 card. Destroy this card
Quote: "You are all beaches. You are all mother freaking beaches. I will not have my Mario Kart legacy like this!!"

Title: Wazzzup!
GameText:
Draw 1 card
Discover 1 Ongoing card.
Hakos Baelz may deal herself 2 fixed psychic damage. If she does, play the top card of your deck.
Quote: "Wazzzup! Good morning. Ohayo... I have coffee. Cawfeee..."

Title: You Wanna Go?
GameText:
Play this card next to a target that does not have "You Wanna Go?" next to it.
+1 damage dealt to and by this target to and by Hakos Baelz.
START PHASE
Either destroy this card, or this target deals Hakos Baelz 1 irreducible psychic damage.
Quote: "Lovers' quarrel?"          "Bae, I mean, waifu killed me with an axe."
